sentences.english: US armsmakers and high-tech industries are salivating at the thought of enteringIndia's market.
sentences.chinese: 美国军火制造商和高科技产业都在垂涎印度的市场。

sentences.chinese: 中国军火商曾拒绝就此事置评。

sentences.english: The Oshkosh Corporation is hiring 750 workers to service its military contracts.
sentences.chinese: 豪士科集团正在为其军火承包合约招聘750名员工。

sentences.english: Israel wants an end to rocket fire and arms-smuggling to Gaza.

sentences.english: They arrested him Thursday on suspicion that he planned to sell weapons in Thailand.
sentences.chinese: 他由于涉嫌计划在泰国贩卖军火于周四被捕。

sentences.english: Libyan man stands near the site of a massive explosion at an ammunition depot in Benghazi.

sentences.english: The technical part was designed for the autonomous work of the arsenal.
sentences.chinese: 专业部是用来从事军火库的自治工作的。
